price: (Bazavuga bati) “Nyagasani wacu! Dukize ibihano! Mu by’ukuri turi abemeramana!”
arabic: رَّبَّنَا ٱكۡشِفۡ عَنَّا ٱلۡعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā ik'shif ʿannā al-ʿadhāba innā mu'minūna
